resources.string: Please register your MEEP!X2 before you can use %1$s! Ask your parent to register your MEEP!X2 on the MEEP! Together Parental Portal, and change the settings for the %2$s.
Please connect online in order to use the %1$s. Do you want to connect to the Wi-Fi now?
This action is blocked by your parents. Please ask them to change their parental settings for you.
Ask your parents to modify their parental settings if you want more playing time!
